Class ConfigLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.ConfigLoader

  • public class ConfigLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to read a xml file and configure a experiment.

    Alvaro A. Belmonte, Amelia Zafra, Eva Gigaja
